name: Mob Rape Quest: Spear-rolling with NPCs in the VR World
name_original: Mob Rape Quest: Spear-rolling with NPCs in the VR World
description:
Synopsis

One day, the main character (you) downloads a VR game on a PC.
"This game is different from traditional VR games, you can fully dive into the real game world."
If you play with half-belief, you really go to the world in the game!
However, the characters in that world are all NPCs who repeat the same words.
Girls who speak only the same lines no matter what they talk to and never refuse to do anything ...

If you tell the girls that you are free to do anything, there is only one thing to do!
Did you know that the game will be cleared when this happens!
I'll commit and commit the NPC girls in this game!

In this way, the "mob quest" only for you and the NPC girls will open ...!
